`tiqcdn` itself is not a tracker, and as commented in Tracking Protection filter
> ! The site should be carefully checked when you add this rule

It requires careful and thorough checking before blocking. Since this is a shopping site and I don't use the site regularly, I'd leave it unblocked unless someone who reguarly use the site can submit evidence that there's really no problem at all.

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://sklep.natko.pl/blog/wpis/wlasciwosci-czarnuszki-egipskiej-i-jej-prozdrowotne-cechy/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsklep.natko.pl%2Fblog%2Fwpis%2Fwlasciwosci-czarnuszki-egipskiej-i-jej-prozdrowotne-cechy%2F) ### Comment > Zarzdzaj zgodami plikw Cookie > Poniej moesz zmieni ustawienia plikw cookies naszych i naszych partnerw. Wicej na temat zbierania danych przez pliki cookie naszych partnerw znajdziesz w polityce dotyczcej cookies Google. Korzystanie przez nas z plikw cookie analitycznych oraz marketingowych wymaga Twojej zgody. W ramach cookies marketingowych wydzielilimy kategori plikw cookie zwizanych z wywietlaniem reklam w zwizku z korzystaniem ze stron internetowych (reklamowe pliki cookie) oraz plikw cookie pozwalajcych na docieranie do Ciebie ze spersonalizowan reklam w portalach spoecznociowych (pliki cookie mediw spoecznociowych). > > Wicej informacji o poszczeglnych kategoriach plikw cookie, ktre stosujemy w serwisie, znajdziesz poniej. Jeeli chcesz zaakceptowa wszystkie pliki cookie, kliknij Zaakceptuj wszystkie. Jeeli natomiast chcesz, ebymy stosowali tylko niezbdne pliki cookie, kliknij Zaakceptuj wybrane i zapisz. Aby zmienia preferencje plikw cookie, przesu suwak przy wybranej kategorii. Masz prawo do wgldu w swoje ustawienia oraz do ich zmiany w dowolnym czasie. Korzystanie z plikw cookie wie si z przetwarzaniem Twoich danych osobowych dotyczcych Twojej aktywnoci w serwisie. > > Szczegowe informacje o sposobie, w jaki my oraz nasi partnerzy uywamy plikw cookie oraz przetwarzamy Twoje dane, a take o przysugujcych Ci prawach, znajdziesz w naszej Polityce Cookies. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> We are talking about Google here, so why do you mention GitHub now?

Because the basic filter also breaks scripts on GitHub, so its fair to mention this, since the problem is the same.

> EDIT: Please add these rules and reply if working:

> ```
> google.com.ua#@%#//scriptlet('remove-attr', 'ping', 'div[id="search"] a[data-ved][ping]')
> google.com.ua#@%#(function() { try { if ("undefined" != typeof localStorage) { window.localStorage.setItem("gtButterbarDismissalExpiry", ((new Date).getTime() + 6048E5).toString()) } } catch (ex) {} })();
> google.com.ua#@%#(function(){try{var time=(new Date).getTime();var cookieDate=new Date(time+1314E6);var hostname=location.host;var locSubString=null;if(!hostname.startsWith("google.")&&!hostname.startsWith("youtube."))locSubString=hostname.substring(hostname.indexOf(".")+1);var loc=locSubString||hostname;if(document.cookie.indexOf("CONSENT=YES")!==-1)return;document.cookie="CONSENT=YES+; domain="+loc+"; path=/; expires="+cookieDate.toUTCString()}catch(ex){console.error("AG: failed to set consent cookie: "+ex)}})();
> google.com.ua#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', 'body > div > div div.GzLjMd > button + button[id="L2AGLb"] > div.QS5gu', '', '500')
> google.com.ua#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', 'body > div > div div.IKl7Q button[id="L2AGLb"] > div.QS5gu', '', '500')
> ```
> 
> If not working, is it working if you only enable Base filter?

None of the rules work.

> EDIT2: EasyList is disabling generichide on google search in the first place, so proposed filter @@||google.com.ua^$jsinject should not have worked in the first place. `@@||google.*^$generichide,jsinject,important`

Add this rule to the list?

comment.body:
> what are you offering? Switch to using the power-hungry version 4.x? Is this really beyond repair?

I just mean that it might be caused by a scriptlet which didn't work correctly in old version (but I might be wrong and I cannot reproduce this problem with version 4).
And if it's the case then it rather shouldn't be fixed in the filters (this way we wouldn't be able to use some scriptlets, because someone uses old version of the app), but rules can be added to user rules (though as I cannot reproduce it, then it's hard to say which exactly rule(s) cause problem).
You can also try to install latest version and then check if issue still occurs.

comment.body:
I'm not sure, but I guess that the problem might be also old version used (`AdGuard for Android v3.6.11 (54)`).
This version uses old scriptlets library and due to this some website might be broken, for example by `trusted-click-element` scriptlet (or by any other scriptlet).

comment.body:
Please open an issue about github.com and post there what exactly is broken ( you can post issue link here). 
Please try this one for github instead:
`@@||github.com^$generichide,jsinject,important`

Could you please double-check your base filter is from today (I am on version 2.3.11.26? Not that there is a bug with getting updates and we are chasing a ghost here.

Except very generic JS inject rules I sadly do not get any applied to my google searches (especially not from Base filter). @AdamWr an idea which JS rule could break it? Probably some generic JS rule is breaking github and google.

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hWJrsz_cmas&t=4s](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DhWJrsz_cmas%26t%3D4s) ### Comment > Hello AdGuard team, > > I've been experiencing an issue with YouTube video playback after the AdGuard Browser Extension blocks the anti-adblock wall. When I visit certain websites that display an anti-adblock message, AdGuard successfully prevents the wall from appearing. However, this seems to interfere with YouTube video playback. > > Steps to reproduce: > 1. Install AdGuard Browser Extension. > 2. Go to YouTube and try playing a video with enabling the AdGuard Browser Extension > 3. Observe that the wall is blocked by AdGuard. > > Expected behavior: > - YouTube videos should play normally. > -Also noticed that when I clean that Website Cookies and watched the YouTube (without signing in my Account) the video plays find even with Adguard Extension enable. but after I signed in the Wall appear again and can't watch the video. > > Actual behavior: > - YouTube videos do not play after the anti-adblock wall is blocked by AdGuard. > > Additional information: > - Browser: [Chrome] > - AdGuard Browser Extension version: [Version 4.2.226] > > Please investigate this issue and provide a fix if possible. comment.body:
> But two days ago there were no breakdowns

That's information might be helpful.
I see that a generic scriptlet has been added (rather incorrectly) and it might causes problem in old version.

Please test this rule:
```adblock
#@%#//scriptlet('prevent-element-src-loading', 'script', 'npttech.com')
```

comment.body:
>You can also try to install latest version and then check if issue still occurs.

There is a forum where  discuss the application, and there they use the old version, like me, with a similar problem, and those who use version 4+ do not have such a problem,But two days ago there were no breakdowns, which means the problem is in the filters, and not in the program. In addition, in the new version 4, filters for tracking trackers and parameters in url have a paid basis. And since I don't have a license key, I won't be able to us them After update.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. comment.body:
I think that scriptlet rules should not be added as a generic solution (except probably few of them), so I have changed the rule.

Basically it looks like that the problem is as mentioned before, old app uses old scriptlets library and some scriptlets have been improved/fixed in new version of the app.
The same problem may occurs on other websites where such scriptlets are applied, but if it would be added for specific website, then it would not be removed if it works correctly with latest version of the app.

issue.title: AdGuard filters interfere with sending YouTube superchats.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.209

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

Desktop

https://yotube.com

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter

_No response_

AdGuard Turkish filter

_No response_
